game_description: A quick demo from the final VR mission In The Training Facility, can you make it to the end without destroying the Hostages, As if you destroy even one of them, you will instantly be taken back to the start of the level. Complete the level without destroying any of them in the fastest time but make sure you take out all the targets in the process. This VR mission is all about speed & accuracy. Do you have what it takes to be the best of the best?
review_1: The demo is fun, nice job It's a quick demo but you can restart at the end to go for a faster time. This is where the replay value is. I need that faster time and it's addictive especially if you think you got a fast time but if you hit any of the red hostages you will instantly scream out loud like I did nooooo F*********k and you start from the beginning again. The pressure of the timer that you don't see till the end is a nice touch as you don't know till the end what your time is, so every second counts and you know it as you play Would be 5stars if maybe a leaderboard or something but for a demo it's fine EDIT: ***THE FULL GAME IS NOW FREE ON SIDE QUEST ***
